website_summaries.verdict: Double stitched for long term wear and provides warmth in addition to compression.
pros: A cost-effective favorite of many who enjoy outdoor athletics and especially in colder environments
Backed by bodybuilders and runners alike
Discreet in terms of fit and appearance as well
cons: May break down if you dry in a dryer versus hanging dry

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again!
customer_reviews.text: Wow!!! Perfect and comfortable fit, i recommend a large if you are around 5 10" to 6" foot tall and weigh 215 to 220 Lb
customer_reviews.author: A Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great inexpensive cycling pants!
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality, if the style fits your tastes. Im 6'4" with 37" inseams and this material can easily reach the length of my leg and can comfortably stretch into my shoes if needed. No highwaters. Tons of room available, which for a tall rider is heavenly. Also hides your junk extremely well. You can only see the crest of your um...helmet. Everything else is completely hidden, no matter how hard you ride, if you get my drift.
customer_reviews.author: High Speed Cyclist

customer_reviews.title: I've got BIG legs...
customer_reviews.text: This thing LOOKS SICK! Besides the fit (which is perfect) this thing looks better than any other compression pant out there! I am a teen (19) and I workout everyday except for 1 during the week. I play soccer, ride bike and I am doing leg day every other day at the gym so because of that yeah, I do have BIG legs... A size LARGE fit perfect for me. I'm 6'2. Will be purchasing more styles!
customer_reviews.author: Lucas B.

customer_reviews.title: Go for it
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for hiking or running in any climate. Keeps your muscle nice and warm. A little tight in the genitals, but don't need those anymore so it doesn't matter. The camouflage look makes for a suave aesthetic.
customer_reviews.author: Sean P.

customer_reviews.title: Athmile is great, and seems to always be!
customer_reviews.text: I have two other pairs of Athmile’s from a couple years back, so the designs are no longer sold (disappointing). Those pants fit flawlessly. I wasn’t sure how this pair would hold up after several years have passed, but these are still incredible! Comfortable, fit great, well worth the price! Can’t say enough about Athmile!!
customer_reviews.author: Donn

customer_reviews.title: Waist needs better tightness
customer_reviews.text: They did not stay up on my waist. I was playing basketball and flag football. I kept having to pull them up over my buttocks. I have a big back side. They might do better for others. I’m glad I wore underwear underneath. If I had not-plumbers crack and sagging would have been a very sloppy look on the field and court!
customer_reviews.author: Marcus Fritz

customer_reviews.title: True to size. Will be a little long for the short guys
customer_reviews.text: Fit is what I expected - I got a small. I am short (5'5") so the pants are long. They stand up to abuse of different style workouts and regular washing. My only challenge is that I am not tall enough so the pants scrunch at the bottom due to excess material.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Weak waist band
customer_reviews.text: They look cool and are made with good material, I got the right size but they are really tight around the legs and that makes the waist band move down and expose me. Good for running but if your bending or twisting I'd consider other options.
customer_reviews.author: Riley Griffith

customer_reviews.title: Great Tight
customer_reviews.text: Really nice tight for the money. Good amount of compression. I’m 5’10”, 200 lbs, fit. The sizing for me is nice all over. I bought 1, then I bought 2 more. My gym is a bit chilly in the winter and these keep my legs nice and warm. The fabric design is great too. Several guys & gals commented on it.
customer_reviews.author: jprok50

customer_reviews.title: Perfection
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'10" and 165 and chose XXL for the comfort. This was the perfect size for me since I didn't all that much suppression. I do a daily walk of 8 or 9 miles for exercise and with the early summer heat in Florida, they do keep you rather cool. Couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Paul G. Schneider

product_meta.title: Athmile Men's Compression Pants Cool Dry Sports Tights Baselayer Capris Legging
product_meta.description:
Athmile Compression Pants:
Flat-lock seam
Smooth, zero friction flatlock seam construction provides excellent comfort and seamless feel.
Four-way stretch
Excellent flexibility in every direction make you feel comfortable under any movement.
Compression&Cool material
Promote body blood circulation and air circulation when doing exercise
Sweat-absorption and Quick dry
Moisture transport system wicks sweat & dries fast,keep dry,clean and comfortable when you are enjoying indoor or outdoor activities
No worry about odour
Repels bad smell left behind after perspire with breathable materials.
Easy to clean
Machine washable,retains shape even after multiple washes.
Closely fit
Fit closely to body,maintain muscle tone,help strengthen muscular build.
Elastic material
Allows greater flexibility & motion with no skin chafing or irritation.
Note
* Do not dry clean,machine wash with cold water,with similar colors *
* To keep the moisture absorption & sweat removing function, please do not use softeners?do not bleach *
* Line Dry/Do not iron * 
Suitable For:
- Running,jogging,marathon
- In Gym,training,fitness
- Play ball games,team sports
- Cycling,camping,hiking,climbing,field Sports,etc.
* 30-Days NO RISK 100% Full Refund Assurance *
feature_bullets: Fabric:Compression fit training leggings made of 95%Polyester,5%Spandex-keep you comfortable and dry.
We strongly recommend one size up.
4-way stretch construction improves your mobility in every direction.
Wide elastic waistband provides a snug, secure fit at your hips.

We always delicate ourselves to providing quality products and service to customers.If you have any problems with the order or any advice for the compression pants styles,size ect.,pls.feel free to EMAIL us and we will try our best to help
